desc:
Dieser Workshop wird auf Englisch gehalten. 

Es geht in diesem Workshop um sexuelle Aufklärung, Prävention und "Safer Sex" zwischen FLINTA-Personen.

As queer people we have to build our sex education for ourselves. We grow up thinking that practices outside of penetration and heterocis norm are risk-free, while barrier tools other than external condoms are unobtainable, expensive, rarely used both in porn and live. 

* What do we consider to be "safer sex between FLINTA people"?  
* How do we approach the topic of prevention with new people or in party settings?
* How do we integrate barriers and their materials within our erotic sexual imagery?
title: Sexual health for dicklits and vulvas
